resources.string:
INSTRUCTIONS
You will be entering a series of dates and times across the 3 interfaces. You will be doing this over 2 different tasks. For each task, we will ask you to complete 5 trials.

TASK 1: accuracy
For this first task, select the date and time as accurately as possible. Press ok when finished. You will do this 5 times.

TASK 2: speed
For this second task, select the date and time as quickly as possible. You will be provided with a limited amount of time, so make your selection quickly. Press ok when finished. You will do this 5 times.

For each of the 4 trials, you will be provided with a different date and time. If you forget, the date and time will be listed at the top of your screen.
